video.title: The House of Flowers
video.synopsis: In this dark comedy, a wealthy matriarch tries to maintain her family's facade of perfection after her husband's mistress exposes their dirty secrets.

episodes.synopsis: The de la Mora family celebrates patriarch Ernesto's birthday with a giant party, but his mistress has darker plans for his big day.
episodes.title: NARCISSUS (symb. lies)

episodes.synopsis: Virginia reads Roberta's letter. Paulina struggles to hide the funeral from her mother and siblings. Ernesto breaks the news to young daughter Micaela.
episodes.title: CHRYSANTHEMUM (symb. pain)

episodes.synopsis: Roberta's actions inspire Julián to share his own news, but mother Virginia is not prepared to listen to what he has to say -- nor is girlfriend Lucía.
episodes.title: LILY (symb. freedom)

episodes.synopsis: Delia reveals a new family secret to Elena. Chance encounters give Virginia and her son creative ideas on how to solve the family's financial troubles.
episodes.title: PETUNIA (symb. resentment)

episodes.synopsis: Elena seeks Claudio's help with a tricky floral order for a VIP client's bar mitzvah, but Paulina sabotages their efforts. The DNA results arrive.
episodes.title: DAHLIA (symb. gratitude)

episodes.synopsis: Paulina sees her ex for the first time in years. Tensions arise between the strippers and the drag queens. Elena makes a startling discovery.
episodes.title: MAGNOLIA (symb. dignity)

episodes.synopsis: To get what she ultimately wants, Lucía holds something over Julián's head. Paulina visits Dr. Cohen to ask an important question.
episodes.title: PEONY (symb. shame)

episodes.synopsis: Ernesto gives Virginia a stirring pep talk about motherhood and revenge. Julián grapples with the consequences of his newfound fame.
episodes.title: BROMELIA (symb. resilience)

episodes.synopsis: A rival florist family makes the de la Moras a generous offer. Elena finds a way to keep Carmela quiet. Paulina confronts her mother about Dr. Cohen.
episodes.title: TULIP (symb. hope)

episodes.synopsis: Virginia's side business gets her in trouble with a competitor, and when Bruno and Micaela go missing shortly afterward, their family fears the worst.
episodes.title: TUSSILAGO (symb. worries)

episodes.synopsis: Dominique surprises Elena in more ways than one. María José tells Bruno about her Madrid plans. Diego finds an item that makes him mistrust Julián.
episodes.title: ORCHID (symb. lust)

episodes.synopsis: After her plan to get Ernesto out of prison hits a snag, Paulina sees Dr. Cohen about her need to fix everyone's problems. A betrayal stuns the family.
episodes.title: SISYMBRIUM (symb. adversity)

episodes.synopsis: The family finally celebrates the flower shop's 50th anniversary. At the event, Virginia publicly announces who will inherit the business.
episodes.title: POPPY (symb. resurrection)

episodes.synopsis: Missing her mother and seeking vengeance against Diego, Paulina returns to Mexico. Julián reunites with an old flame, who reveals a secret.
episodes.title: ROSE, (Symb unity)

episodes.synopsis: Paulina is determined to buy back the family's former flower shop and cabaret, but obstacles arise. Diego makes a peace offering. Elena comes clean.
episodes.title: IRIS, (Symb. faith)

episodes.synopsis: Elena wants to keep her new job a secret. Paulina asks the former drag performers to return to the cabaret. Ernesto meets the Flock's founder, Jenny.
episodes.title: LOTUS, (Symb. mystery)

episodes.synopsis: After returning from Spain, María José takes issue with Paulina, while Bruno accompanies Micaela to her talent show audition. Julián makes a decision.
episodes.title: ALMOND, (Symb. awaken)

episodes.synopsis: Elena, Paulina and Julián attempt to track down the mystery man in Virginia's photos. Ernesto convinces Cacas to join the Flock.
episodes.title: ACACIA, (Symb. secret love)

episodes.synopsis: Jenny and the Flock start taking over the de la Mora mansion. Paulina confides in Alejo and plots revenge against Diego. Elena realizes she's in love.
episodes.title: CLOVES, (Symb, capricious)

episodes.synopsis: Diego confronts Lucía about a secret she's been keeping from Julián. Ernesto's jealousy takes hold. On a night out with Alejo, Paulina feels tempted.
episodes.title: GERANIUM, (Symb. counsel)

episodes.synopsis: Diego asks Elena for a very personal favor for him and Julián. Paulina gets closer to Alejo. Eliminations continue on "Mexico's Most Talented."
episodes.title: HELICONIA, (Symb. fertility)

episodes.synopsis: Virginia's will is finally read, and when the truth comes out, Paulina makes a drastic decision in an attempt to repent for her actions.
episodes.title: PANSY, (Symb. reflexion)

episodes.synopsis: In the present, Paulina is surprised by her new cellmate. Shocking news is revealed about Elena. In 1979, rebellious Virginia celebrates her birthday.
episodes.title: PETUNIA (Symb. cunning)

episodes.synopsis: Purificación complicates life for Paulina. Diego and Julián reach out to Elena's exes. Back in 1979, Virginia tries new experiences.
episodes.title: SUNFLOWER (Symb. power)

episodes.synopsis: Victoria sends Virginia to a strict all-girls school. Diego attempts to reconcile with his homophobic parents, who offer him a suggestion.
episodes.title: GERBERA (Symb. first love)

episodes.synopsis: María José suspects Purificación is hiding something. Paulina forges new alliances in prison. Ernesto lets the performers manage the cabaret.
episodes.title: MALLOW (Symb. ambition)

episodes.synopsis: In 1979, Virginia receives life-changing news as her father continues to get sicker. Paulina is freed from jail with María José's help.
episodes.title: AZALEA (Symb. temperance)

episodes.synopsis: Victoria's meddling creates a conflict between the de la Mora siblings. A worried María José attempts to convince Purificación to seek mental help.
episodes.title: BETONY (Symb. surprise)

episodes.synopsis: Julián finds out more about what happened between Elena and Diego. In 1979, Virginia plans to break the news to Salo and decide on their future.
episodes.title: CLOVER (Symb. revenge)

episodes.synopsis: Virginia is convinced her father has abandoned them, while Pato begins to suspect the truth. In the present, Pablo helps Elena escape.
episodes.title: COHOSH (Symb. scandal)

episodes.synopsis: Paulina looks into her family's past and starts asking questions about Pato. Julián and Elena team up to try and free Diego. Delia seeks revenge.
episodes.title: HYACINTH (Symb. jealousy)

episodes.synopsis: Virginia comes up with a plan for her and Ernesto. Now, La Chiva reveals the truth to Paulina. Conflict increases between Delia and Victoria.
episodes.title: ELFDOCK (Symb. tears)

episodes.synopsis: The members of the de la Mora family each celebrate their new beginning while, in the shadows, Purificación plots her revenge.
episodes.title: LAUREL (Symb. glory)
